room_title: Escape room "Guards Vs Prisoners" by The Great Xscape Room in Virginia Beach
review: We had a great time doing guards vs. Prisoners. Definitely a good time for anyone looking for some competition.

room_title: Escape room "Guards Vs Prisoners" by The Great Xscape Room in Virginia Beach
review: We had a great time today participating in Guards vs. Prisoners. The clues were difficult enough to be fun, but not impossible. Our host was phenomenal. The waiting room with Nintendo 64 and treats was also great. Thanks for an amazing time!

room_title: Escape room "Guards Vs Prisoners" by The Great Xscape Room in Virginia Beach
review: We did the Prisoners vs Guards experience and it was awesome. The staff (especially Mel) were super helpful and friendly. Definitely will be back.
